meanings.sent1: The clasped hands showed their strong bond.
meanings.sent2: She wore a clasped bracelet on her wrist.
meanings.sent3: The clasped gloves looked like they were holding hands.
meanings.sent4: The clasped lock kept the treasure safe.
meanings.sent5: The clasped fingers formed a protective shield.

meanings.sent1: The clasped books were neatly stacked on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The clasped arms indicated a warm embrace.
meanings.sent3: The clasped papers seemed to be gossiping to each other.
meanings.sent4: The clasped vines formed a natural barrier.
meanings.sent5: The clasped hands symbolized unity and strength.

meanings.sent1: The clasped necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her clasped purse contained all her essentials.
meanings.sent3: The clasped belt seemed to be on a diet, holding everything in.
meanings.sent4: The clasped door kept the room secure.
meanings.sent5: The clasped bracelet jingled with every movement.
